website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for an attractive and affordable gong for decorative purposes or meditation, this is an excellent option.
pros: This compact desk gong features Chinese zodiac symbols and a yin-yang circle in the center
Makes an excellent gift or decorative addition to a room

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and rather flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The stand is rather light and flimsy and the gong hangs low and awkwardly. It kept hitting the sides. I’ve adjusted it and am considering sending it back. I use it to start our meditation and end our meditation with my toddler. It’s a fun tool and reward for teaching little ones to meditate.
customer_reviews.author: Portia James-McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Good sound particulary for small size
customer_reviews.text: This gong has a good sound and is fairly loud when you consider its size. The support for the metal gong is simple, effective, and has a pleasing appearance. We are using it in a large open office (90ftx30ft) for visitors to get the attention of our staff. It is loud enough for our office.
customer_reviews.author: J. Keller

customer_reviews.title: How small it is!
customer_reviews.text: I was using this item to call people to dinner from my home, but you could not hear the gong over the conversation. There were no measurements on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was packed perfectly secured in the box. It was a Beautiful Addition to my zen area in my Room. The gong has pretty loud good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Bethy

customer_reviews.title: Has a tinny sound.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grown son who loves unusual things. He specifically asked for one with a true gong sound. This was not it. It had a tinny sound. I returned it and purchased the one from Woodstock Chimes. Yes, the price is way more, but if you want a truly authentic sound, that is what you need. This one is probably ok for a decorative item to set on your desk, but don't expect a great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of Asian art
customer_reviews.text: Very nice...creates a nice touch of elegance to my bookcase. Light weight and made well. Fast devilery too!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Germany

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the price
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gag gift for our boss in our office. He loves it and rings it almost daily!
customer_reviews.author: MomGeek

customer_reviews.title: Great Office Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My office loves this. I put it up for Chinese New Year and people came right up and banged the gong.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Small

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Very cute but thought it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Annette S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, but is more like a toy gong than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.text: I really love this. It is my favorite. How ever my only con is that it is a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother for his birthday and he loves it. Perfect for small spaces (desk or shelves)!
customer_reviews.author: Rabiya

product_meta.title: Zen 12 Chinese Zodiac Table Gong Feng Shui Meditation Desk Bell Home Decor Housewarming Congratulatory Blessing Gift US Seller
product_meta.description: It makes soothing sound (wind chime) when you hit the copper frame. It is believed that wind chime may keep you calm and peaceful. This will attract positive energy and bring you peace of mind!! Idea for self-meditation. Perfect home decor to create Zen environment at home or in office. You may display it on your office desk or shelf. It also believes can attract wealth and keep your home peaceful and safe by keeping evil spirits away. Good Feng Shui! Chinese Zodiac is derived from your birth year, according to the Chinese lunar year. It's the similar concept in western astrology and means "circle of animals". The major different between western and Chinese, Chinese Zodiac corresponds to years rather than months.!! **Sound is loud, you may use it as desk bell or ring bell in restaurant or store :) Idea for Housewarming, Congratulatory and Blessing Gift!
